documents.summary: Add references to SPEC016 buffer specifications.

edits.current_content: Documents bug where duration calculated from growing buffer
edits.new_content:
Bug #1: Duration Climbing

See [SPEC016 Buffers](SPEC016-decoder_buffer_design.md#buffers) for authoritative buffer behavior specification ([DBD-BUF-010] through [DBD-BUF-060]).

Problem: Duration calculated from growing buffer with incremental filling...
edits.rationale: Bug fix document should reference authoritative buffer design

edits.current_content: Race condition between position tracking and buffer growth
edits.new_content:
Bug #2: Race Condition

Related to buffer exhaustion detection ([SPEC016 DBD-BUF-040](SPEC016-decoder_buffer_design.md#buffers)).

Problem: Race condition between position tracking and buffer growth...
edits.rationale: Link race condition to buffer exhaustion detection in SPEC016

documents.summary: Add references to SPEC016 authoritative specifications.

edits.new_content:
2-thread decoder pool

Note: Design evolved to serial execution per [SPEC016 DBD-DEC-040](SPEC016-decoder_buffer_design.md#decoders) for improved cache coherency.

edits.current_content: Documents change to incremental buffer filling
edits.new_content:
Fix 2: Partial Buffer Playback

Extends partial buffer strategy ([SPEC014 SSD-PBUF-010](SPEC014-single_stream_design.md)).

See [SPEC016 Buffers - DBD-BUF-050](SPEC016-decoder_buffer_design.md#buffers) for buffer flow control specification (decoder pauses when buffer nearly full).
edits.rationale: Review document should cite authoritative buffer spec

edits.current_content: Detection: Mixer monitors playback position vs buffer length
edits.new_content:
Fix 3: Buffer Underrun Detection and Recovery

Implements underrun detection specified in [SPEC016 Buffers - DBD-BUF-040](SPEC016-decoder_buffer_design.md#buffers).

Detection: Mixer monitors playback position vs buffer length...

edits.current_content: if let Some(ref underrun) = self.underrun_state.clone() { ... return underrun.flatline_frame; }
edits.rationale: Link underrun flatline to SPEC016 pause mode

edits.current_content: Average passage duration: 4 minutes (240 seconds). Per-buffer size: 240s × 44,100 Hz × 2 channels × 4 bytes = 84.67 MB
edits.new_content:
Memory Analysis

Based on [SPEC016 DBD-PARAM-070](SPEC016-decoder_buffer_design.md#operating-parameters) buffer size specification:

Average passage duration: 4 minutes (240 seconds)
Per-buffer size: 240s × 44,100 Hz × 2 channels × 4 bytes = 84.67 MB

PassageBuffer: Added Incremental Methods

Incremental buffer filling extends [SPEC016 Buffers - DBD-BUF-010](SPEC016-decoder_buffer_design.md#buffers) architecture.

Methods: append_samples, reserve_capacity

documents.summary: Add reference to SPEC016 buffer lifecycle.

edits.new_content:
BufferStatus enum: Decoding, Ready, Playing, Exhausted

See [SPEC016 Buffers](SPEC016-decoder_buffer_design.md#buffers) for complete buffer lifecycle specification:
- [DBD-BUF-020]: Empty on start
- [DBD-BUF-030]: Mixer can't read empty buffer
- [DBD-BUF-040]: Returns last sample if empty
- [DBD-BUF-050]: Decoder pauses when nearly full
- [DBD-BUF-060]: Informs queue on completion
edits.rationale: Event definition should reference state machine in SPEC016
API design should acknowledge SPEC016 for buffer status endpoints and SPEC017 for timing value formats

documents.summary: Add reference to SPEC016/SPEC017 in governance examples.
